<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Idol Threat](/Feats.aspx?ID=3942) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 33</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Beastbrood](/Feats.aspx?ID=2449)

**Requirements**
You're holding something sacred or precious to a creature, such as a relic or personal depiction of their deity or a precious personal memento.

</column>

---

You brandish the precious object you're holding menacingly, at once mocking it and threatening its safety. Attempt to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) the creature whose precious item you threaten. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check to Demoralize, and on a success, the creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) for 1 round out of distraction for the object's safety and is [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 1 minute (or stupefied 2 on a critical success). These conditions are both in addition to the normal effects of Demoralize. The creature is then temporarily immune to any Idol Threat using that specific object for 1 day.
